items.title: Shirts
items.imageAlt: Vote on the 2025 Tiny Porch T-shirt Deign today!
items.description:
[Thank you to StudioTwoThree for printing all of our 2024 shirts and for 250+ neighbors for purchasing shirts and wearing with pride as we support Richmond's budding musical performers! ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScjITxDYXZqrh84aSCpXl7j5Gpfun9V-yO6cef7_cceAHEe6A/viewform)

[](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScjITxDYXZqrh84aSCpXl7j5Gpfun9V-yO6cef7_cceAHEe6A/viewform)

Ordering information about 2025 shirts coming soon! For now, [vote here ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeF_MUug5vM6gnFlTQsC5mul-_9tnz-Fjsd8l7VzlV_jO_Y6A/viewform)for the shirt design for the 2025 Tiny Porch shirts. [](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScjITxDYXZqrh84aSCpXl7j5Gpfun9V-yO6cef7_cceAHEe6A/viewform)

items.title: Koozies
items.description: Grab an official Tiny Porch Koozie over at the Free Little Library at 811 W. 29th St! Only $2 Each!
